# OpenClaw Skills Reference

## Communication

- **email** — Send and receive emails
- **calendar** — Calendar management and scheduling
- **reminders** — Set and manage reminders
- **notes** — Note-taking and organization

## Web & Research

- **web-browsing** — Browse and extract web content
- **search** — Web search integration
- **news** — News aggregation and summarization
- **wikipedia** — Wikipedia lookups

## Development

- **code-execution** — Run code snippets
- **github** — GitHub integration
- **code-review** — Code review assistance

## File Management

- **file-management** — Create, read, organize files
- **image-generation** — AI image generation
- **document-analysis** — Parse and analyze documents
- **spreadsheet** — Spreadsheet operations

## Social & Communication

- **social** — Social media management
- **twitter** — Twitter/X posting and monitoring
- **farcaster** — Farcaster integration

## Blockchain & Crypto

- **token-info** — Token details and metadata
- **price-watch** — Price monitoring and alerts
- **wallet-check** — Wallet balance queries
- **transaction-tracker** — Transaction monitoring

## Agent Operations

- **agent-ops** — Sub-agent management
- **agent-security** — Security monitoring
- **delegation** — Task delegation to sub-agents

## Productivity

- **translation** — Multi-language translation
- **summarization** — Content summarization
- **writing** — Writing assistance
- **math** — Mathematical calculations

## Integration

- **webhooks** — Webhook management
- **api-caller** — Generic API integration
- **database** — Database queries
- **mqtt** — IoT/MQTT messaging

## Custom Skills

Users can create custom skills by:

1. Implementing the Skill interface
2. Defining triggers and handlers
3. Registering in `skills.config.ts`
